::Slayer::

Carrying Iguanus, Slayer stops about a mile away from the Trainers 
base, hovering in the air. He frowns, wondering whether Prebon had 
put the base on alert before leaving.

Not sure if the defences would let him through, Slayer speeds up, 
heading for the base.
